mapper.select: SELECT detpname, detptitle, detpexpiry, detpperiod, detptitleinfo FROM ( SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS r, a.* FROM ( SELECT a.detpname, a.detptitle, a.detpexpiry, a.detpperiod, a.detptitleinfo FROM pj_employ_detp a WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY a.detpname,a.detptitle, a.detpexpiry, a.detpperiod, a.detptitleinfo ORDER BY detpname DESC ) a, (SELECT @RNUM:=0) b ) temp WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select detpname, detptitle, detpexpiry ,detpperiod from pj_employ_detp
select detpname, detptitle, detpexpiry ,detpperiod from pj_employ_detp where detpname like CONCAT ('%',#{searchWord}, '%') ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pj_employ_detp ( detpname , detptitle , detpperiod , detpexpiry ,detptitleinfo,useYN ) VALUES ( #{detpname}, #{detptitle}, #{detpperiod}, #{detpexpiry} , #{detptitleinfo} , #{useYN} )
